text: @BorisJohnson When can I get married? Please release guidance on when and how you will allow weddings! 500 at ascot. Sports, shops, zoos, theme parks all reopening. But you wont even allow a wedding of 6 people. What's the difference between a wedding and a bbq? #weddings #wedding #COVID19
